definition: to paint a dragon and dot in the eyes (idiom); fig. to add the vital finishing touch/the crucial point that brings the subject to life/a few words to clinch the point
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
dragon/CL:條|条[tiao2]/imperial
surname Long

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
eye/eyeball

sentences.english: Simile makes the finishing point in Chinese and English.
sentences.chinese: 在英汉语言中，明喻都起到了画龙点睛的作用。

sentences.english: The last sentence of this essay makes the finishing point.
sentences.chinese: 这篇文章的最后一句话具有画龙点睛的作用。

sentences.english: A small button, may play a finishing touch on the role of clothing.
sentences.chinese: 一颗小小的纽扣，可能对服装起到画龙点睛的作用。

sentences.english: If combined with pierced processes but also put the finishing touch, complement each other.
sentences.chinese: 如果结合镂空工艺更是画龙点睛，相得益彰。

sentences.english: This scarf makes the finishing point of the clothes she wears today.
sentences.chinese: 这条丝巾为她今天的服装起到了画龙点睛的作用。

sentences.english: The plaque is the title section of the finishing touch pen.
sentences.chinese: 牌匾的题款乃是画龙点睛之笔。

sentences.english: I think that got a lot of press for the game.
sentences.chinese: 我想这是游戏的画龙点睛之处。

sentences.english: The inside left is passing the oppose side's fullback line.
sentences.chinese: 这左辅画龙点睛越过对方的后卫线。

definition: the brush stroke that dots in the eyes (idiom); fig. to add the vital finishing touch/the crucial point that brings the subject to life/a few words to clinch the point
to add the finishing touch (abbr. for 畫龍點睛|画龙点睛[hua4 long2 dian3 jing1])
to decorate/to adorn/sprinkled/studded/only for show
to enrich/to enhance/to beautify
background (of a painting)/backdrop/a foil (to set off something to advantage)/to offset (something to advantage)
lit. on brocade, add flowers (idiom); to decorate sth already perfect/gilding the lily
lit. draw legs on a snake (idiom); fig. to ruin the effect by adding sth superfluous/to overdo it
to bring out the best in each other (idiom)/to complement one another well
(idiom) appropriate/apt/just right
it's just perfect/it's just right
to hit on sth new (idiom); to display originality/to adopt an original approach
lit. the voice of the guest overwhelms that of the host (idiom)/fig. a minor player upstages the main attraction/minor details obscure the main point/the sauce is better than the fish
to conform (with)/to echo/to correlate well/(linguistics) agreement
to decorate/decoration/decorative/ornamental
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
to set off
